decision_conditions:
in accordance with plans

- Bedrock and Faults Map - Slice A
- Phase 1 Desk Study, prepared by Lustre Consulting, dated May 2014
- Ground Investigation Report, prepared by The Brownfield Consultancy, dated 9 February 2017
- Verification Report, prepared by The Brownfield Consultancy, dated 9 November 2018
- Borehole Investigation, prepared by Soil Investigation, dated 22/06/16

- Drawing no. 3120 PL106 Rev B 'Proposed planting plan'
- Soft landscaping works, 5 year maintenance plan, prepared by Open Spaces- Landscape &  Arboricultural Consultants Ltd.
- Service and Delivery Management Plan, prepared by Waterman, dated 7 September 2016

- Schedule of Materials for 4148/17
- Drawing no. 3120 PL16-1F- Elevation with materials
- Tawny Buff Brick technical specification sheet (Wienerberger Building Material Solutions)
- Red Gilt Stock Brick technical specification sheet (Wienerberger Building Material Solutions)
- Equitone [natura] specification sheet
- Lignacite Original Facing Masonry specification sheet

- Drawing no. PAE-400-01-01 'Ventilation Layour First Floor Plan'
- Drawing no. PAE-400-02 'Ventilation Layour Second Floor Plan'

- Drawing no. 3120_C08.2H 'External works and levels'
- Drawing no. 3120 PL02L 'Proposed Site Plan'
- Drawing no. 3120PL104A 'CMS Plan'
- Car Parking Management Plan, Revision C
- Drawing no. 3120_PL08 'Delivery and Collection Point'
- Delivery details, Rev A
- Construction Method Statement, prepared by Dovetail Architects Ltd, dated November 2018

- Drawing no. 3120 PL06 Rev H 'Proposed Third Floor Plan'
- Drawing no. 3120_C41 Rev A 'Proposed Rear Staircase'

- CMEV.4 / CMEV.4e / CMEV.4eHT: Mechanical Extract Ventilation System Specifications
- CMEV.4e 'Central Continuous Mechanical Extract System' specifications
- AGC Glazing specification sheet, dated 28-06-2013
- VOC Barrier Membrane specfications
- Drawing no. 3120 PL17 'Privacy Screen Details'

- SUDS Report, prepared by Haydn Evans Consulting, reference no. 113/097 dated July 2017
description: Obscure glazing and screens (Condition 2); Materials (Condition 4); Hard and soft landscaping (Condition 5); Soil site investigation and verification report (Condition 7); Construction method statement (Condition 8); Mechanical ventilation (Condition 10); Vehicular access (Condition 13); Car parking management plan (Condition 14); Service and delivery management plan (Condition 15); Floor plans for wheelchair adaptable flats (Condition 20); Sustainable drainage measures (Condition 27): Demolition of existing public house. Erection of four storey building to provide ground floor commercial unit with 15 flats (7 x 1 bedroom, 7 x 2 bedrooms, 1 x 3 bedrooms) on floors above, ancillary parking and landscaping (retrospective) (Summary).
